## hpr0672 :: How I Upgraded My PC - CPU

 
In this episode, Claudio talks about his current desktop PC and covers the what, why, and how of his new CPU purchase.


AnandTech: https://www.anandtech.com/show/4025/holiday-2010-system-builders-guide
Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_AMD_Phenom_microprocessors
